    • createProductorUser

      public String createProductorUser(String nickNameUs, String idUs, String nameProducer, String URLproducer, int reproductionQuantityProducer, int hours, int minutes, int second, int choose)
      createProductorUser: create user productor.
      Parameters:
      nickNameUs - : String=> user's nickname.
      idUs - : String=> user's id.
      nameProducer - : String=> producer's name.
      URLproducer - : String=> producer's url image.
      reproductionQuantityProducer - : int=> number of playback replays from the producer.
      hours - : int=> number of hours of playback.
      minutes - : int=> number of minutes of playback.
      second - : int=> number of second of playback.
      choose - : int=> select tool.
      Returns:
      msj: String=> confirmation message.

    • createConsumerUser

      public String createConsumerUser(String nickNameUs, String idUs, int hours, int minutes, int second, String mostListenedGender, String mostListenedArtist, int numberOfList, int choose)
      createConsumerUser: create user consumer.
      Parameters:
      nickNameUs - : String=> user's nickname.
      idUs - : String=> user's id.
      hours - : int=> number of hours of playback.
      minutes - : int=> number of minutes of playback.
      second - : int=> number of second of playback.
      mostListenedGender - : String=>most played music genre.
      mostListenedArtist - : String=>most played music artist.
      numberOfList - : int=> number of playlists
      choose - : int=> select tool.
      Returns:
      msj: String=> confirmation message.

    • createProducts

      public String createProducts(String nameProduct, String idOwner, String url, int hours, int minutes, int second, int reproductionNumber, String album, int musicGenderSelection, double saleValue, int numberSales, String description, int podcastsCategorySelection, int choose)
      createProducts: create audio product.
      Parameters:
      nameProduct - : String=> product's name.
      idOwner - : String=> owner's name.
      url - : String=> product's url image.
      hours - : int=> hours of duration.
      minutes - : int=> minutes of duration.
      second - : int=> seconds of duration.
      reproductionNumber - : int=> number of playback replays from the product.
      album - : String=> album to which a song belongs.
      musicGenderSelection - : int=> song genre selection.
      saleValue - : int=> sale value of the song.
      numberSales - : int=> number of sales of a song.
      description - : String=> podcast description.
      podcastsCategorySelection - : int=> podcast category selection.
      choose - : int=> select tool.
      Returns:
      msj: String=> confirmatio message.
